entityname.Kily_Rainforest_ltt:
Kily Tree
Click to select and then place a kily tree, which produces fruit that ring tailed lemurs love to eat.
entityname.LemurRingtailed_Gift_lower: the ring tailed lemur stuffed animal
entityname.LemurRingtailed_Gift_ltt:
Ring Tailed Lemur Stuffed Animal
Guests who enjoy watching the ring tailed lemur will buy this gift.
entityname.Terrain_Bananas_ltt:
Bananas
Click to select and then place bananas, which are popular with chimpanzees, gorillas, and ring tailed lemurs.
entityname.LemurRingtailed_ltt:
Ring Tailed Lemur
Click to select and then place a ring tailed lemur, a native of the island of Madagascar.

entityname.ShadeStructure_Shelter_ltt:
Shade Structure
